00044 #include "CmdLightKitModified.h"
00045 
00046 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoSceneKit.h>
00047 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoNodeKitListPart.h>

00049 #include "TGateEngine.h"
00050 #include "tgf.h"
00051 #include "Trace.h"

00053 
00054 CmdLightKitModified::CmdLightKitModified( TLightKit* newLightKit, SoSceneKit* scene, SceneModel& sceneModel, QUndoCommand* parent )
00055 : QUndoCommand("Modify LightKit", parent), m_pPreviousLightKit( 0 ), m_pNewLightKit( newLightKit ), m_scene( scene ), m_pModel( &sceneModel )
00056 {
00057     Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::CmdLightKitModified", false );
00058         m_pNewLightKit->ref();
00059         
00060         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( m_scene->getPart("lightList[0]", false) );
00061         if( lightKit )  m_pPreviousLightKit = dynamic_cast< TLightKit* >( lightKit->copy( true ) );
00062 
00063 }
00064 
00065 CmdLightKitModified::~CmdLightKitModified()
00066 {
00067         Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::~CmdLightKitModified", false );
00068         m_pNewLightKit->unref();
00069 }
00070 
00071 void CmdLightKitModified::undo()
00072 {
00073         Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::undo", false );
00074   
00075     if( m_pPreviousLightKit )
00076     {
00077         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( m_scene->getPart("lightList[0]", false) );
00078                 SoTransform* lightTransform =static_cast< SoTransform* > ( lightKit->getPart("transform", false) );
00079                 SoTransform* oldTransform =static_cast< SoTransform* > ( m_pPreviousLightKit->getPart("transform", false) );
00080                 
00081                 lightTransform->translation.setValue(oldTransform->translation.getValue().getValue() );
00082                 lightTransform->rotation.setValue( oldTransform->rotation.getValue().getValue());
00083                 lightTransform->scaleFactor.setValue( oldTransform->scaleFactor.getValue().getValue());
00084                 lightTransform->scaleOrientation.setValue( oldTransform->scaleOrientation.getValue().getValue());
00085                 lightTransform->center.setValue( oldTransform->center.getValue().getValue());
00086                 
00087                 TShape* shape =static_cast< TShape* > ( m_pPreviousLightKit->getPart("icon", false) );
00088                 lightKit->setPart("icon", shape );
00089                 
00090                 TSunShape* sunhape =static_cast< TSunShape* > ( m_pPreviousLightKit->getPart("tsunshape", false) );
00091                 lightKit->setPart("tsunshape", sunhape );
00092     }
00093     else
00094     {
00095         m_pModel->RemoveLightNode( *m_pNewLightKit );
00096     }
00097 }
00098 
00099 void CmdLightKitModified::redo( )
00100 {
00101         Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::redo", false );
00102         
00103         SoTransform* newTransform =static_cast< SoTransform* > ( m_pNewLightKit->getPart("transform", false) );
00104         if( !m_pPreviousLightKit )
00105         {
00106                  m_pModel->InsertLightNode( *m_pNewLightKit );
00107         }
00108         else
00109         {       
00110                 TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( m_scene->getPart("lightList[0]", false) );
00111                 SoTransform* lightTransform =static_cast< SoTransform* > ( lightKit->getPart("transform", false) );
00112                 
00113                 lightTransform->translation.setValue(newTransform->translation.getValue().getValue() );
00114                 lightTransform->rotation.setValue( newTransform->rotation.getValue().getValue());
00115                 lightTransform->scaleFactor.setValue( newTransform->scaleFactor.getValue().getValue());
00116                 lightTransform->scaleOrientation.setValue( newTransform->scaleOrientation.getValue().getValue());
00117                 lightTransform->center.setValue( newTransform->center.getValue().getValue());
00118                 
00119                 TShape* shape =static_cast< TShape* > ( m_pNewLightKit->getPart("icon", false) );
00120                 lightKit->setPart("icon", shape );
00121                 
00122                 TSunShape* sunhape =static_cast< TSunShape* > ( m_pNewLightKit->getPart("tsunshape", false) );
00123                 lightKit->setPart("tsunshape", sunhape );
00124                 
00125         }
00126 
00127 }
